howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Learn how to use PikDrive in a few simple steps

step1.title: 1. Choose Your Destination
step1.description: Select your departure city, destination and date. Browse available options and choose a driver that suits you.

step2.title: 2. Make Payment
step2.description: Reserve your seat by paying via Mobile Money, bank card or cash at our partners. Payment is temporarily blocked.

step3.title: 3. Receive Your Code
step3.description: After payment, you receive a unique verification code by SMS and in the app. Keep it safe.

step4.title: 4. Validate Ride
step4.description: Present your code to the driver when you board. This code unlocks payment and confirms your ride.

whyCode.title: Why use the code system?
whyCode.description: Our unique code system ensures you only pay for services you actually receive. The driver only receives payment after you validate your presence in the vehicle by presenting the code.
whyCode.securePaymentDesc: Your money is protected until you confirm the service
whyCode.antiFraudDesc: Prevents fake bookings and guarantees passenger presence
whyCode.offlineDesc: The code works even without permanent internet connection

verifyDriver.title: Verify Driver Identity
verifyDriver.content: Always verify that the driver's profile photo and vehicle details match what you see in person. Ask to see their PikDrive identification card.

shareTrip.title: Share Your Trip
shareTrip.content: Use our 'Share Trip' feature to allow friends or family to track your journey in real-time. This feature works even in low connectivity areas.

stayPublic.title: Stay in Public Places
stayPublic.content: For pickups and drop-offs, stick to well-lit public places whenever possible. Avoid isolated pickup points, especially at night.

keepCodeSecret.title: Keep Your Code Confidential
keepCodeSecret.content: Never share your verification code before being in the vehicle and ready to leave. The code is your guarantee that you will receive the booked service.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions

howWorks.question: How does PikDrive work exactly?
howWorks.answer: PikDrive is an intercity ride-sharing platform in Cameroon that works in 4 simple steps: 1) You choose your destination and a verified driver. 2) You pay to reserve your seat via Mobile Money, bank card or cash at our partners. 3) You receive a unique verification code after payment. 4) You show this code to the driver at departure time, which validates the ride and releases payment to the driver.

howBook.question: How do I book a ride?
howBook.answer: Go to the 'Find a Ride' page, select your departure city and destination. Choose from available drivers based on schedules and prices that suit you. Proceed to payment via our secure platform and you'll receive a confirmation code and ride details by SMS and in the app.

verificationCode.question: How does the verification code system work?
verificationCode.answer: After making your payment, you receive a unique 6-digit code by SMS and in the app. This code should only be presented to the driver when you're ready to begin your journey. The driver enters this code in their app, which confirms your presence and authorizes payment release. Without this code, the driver does not receive payment.

offline.question: What happens if I lose internet connection?
offline.answer: PikDrive works even with limited internet connection. Your verification code is sent by SMS and can be presented offline. Drivers can also validate codes offline, and synchronization will occur automatically once connection is restored.

driverCancel.question: What happens if my driver cancels?
driverCancel.answer: If your driver cancels, you'll be notified immediately by SMS and notification in the app. You can then either choose another available driver (we'll suggest alternatives), or request a full refund which will be processed within 24 hours to your original payment method.

becomeDriver.question: How do I become a driver?
becomeDriver.answer: Visit our 'Become a Driver' page to start the process. You'll need to provide: a valid ID, your driver's license, vehicle documents (registration card, insurance, technical inspection), and a professional photo. Our teams verify these documents and organize a quick training on using the app. The process usually takes 48-72 hours.

paymentSecure.question: Is my payment secure?
paymentSecure.answer: Yes, we use international standard encryption for all transactions. Payments are secured by our verification code system: money is only released to the driver after your code validation, ensuring you receive the booked service. If you have any issues, our support team is available 24/7.
